name: Fumble Can't Fly
description:
A game submitted to the first Speed Game Jam!

If the Game doesn't fit in the window provided try going fullscreen

The nefarious Skeeter Von Bloodsworth has   taken   all of the juicy   blood for himself!   Take control of Fumble   the Bat and   race to   defeat him as fast as you can!   All the while spin   attack to   steal health from skeeter  before the last of  your blood drains away!             

To attack Skeeter, Dash into him whilst he is jumping to drain his health Controls:

Movement: WASD

Jump: SPACE

Dash / Attack: LEFT SHIFT
